metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4421 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The buf_decompress function in packet.c in Dropbear SSH Server before 2013.59 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a compressed packet that has a large size when it is decompressed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4421` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2013.59
dropbear-bin - 2013.59
dropbear-initramfs - 2013.59
dropbear-run - 2013.59
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dropbear package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2013.59').
